citations.narrative:
Male dog #040 had some matted hair on his stomach and by his tail and legs. Matted hair can cause dog discomfort and
skin problems. For their health; ensure that dogs have healthy and unmatted hair coats as required.
***Licensee corrected this item before report delivery and exit interview.
***Maintain corrected from 1/20/2026 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(4) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
Male dog #040 had some matted hair on his stomach and by his tail and legs. Matted hair can cause dog discomfort and 
skin problems. For their health; ensure that dogs have healthy and unmatted hair coats as required.  
***Licensee corrected this item before report delivery and exit interview. 
***Maintain corrected from 1/20/2026 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
